# TASK::IS_MOUNTED_WEAPON_TASK_UNDERNEATH_DRIVING_TASK

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Used to query if the mounted weapon control task given by CONTROL_MOUNTED_WEAPON is set on driving ped
